label: 凌雲集
本: Sugawara no Michizane and the Early Heian Court . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: The first imperial kanshi anthology (compiled under the order of Emperor Saga).  Most of the Ryōunshū's ninety poems followed the elaborate T'ang rules for tone patterns and thus were in the contemporary Chinese style (p. 42). [漢詩、嵯峨天皇]
